title: Ouji-Kei Joushi No Nakami Wa Yajuu!? ~Ore Konomi Ni Kyousei Shite Yaru~
alternative_title: 王子系上司の中身は野獣!? ～オレ好みに矯正してやる～ ; OJIKEIJOSHINO NAKAMIHA YAJU OREGONOMINI KYOSEISHITEYARU ; The Devilish Side Of My Princely Boss -I'll Be Your Coach-
status: 王子系上司の中身は野獣!? ～オレ好みに矯正してやる～ ; OJIKEIJOSHINO NAKAMIHA YAJU OREGONOMINI KYOSEISHITEYARU ; The Devilish Side Of My Princely Boss -I'll Be Your Coach-
description:
Description :
        Kururi Himekawa just landed a new job at the apparel company of her dreams. As a self?proclaimed undesirable woman, she finds herself working overtime as the tenured "hot girls" keep pushing their work onto her. On one such evening, Rui Tamasaka, a man Kururi has put on a g**?like pedestal, offers some words of encouragement. However, within a matter of minutes, the same man she believed to be the embodiment of kindness flips out on Kururi for the way she's styled her outfit. Kururi soon finds herself subjected to a tirade of harsh criticism from Rui. And, while she's trying to focus on the advice she's receiving, she can't help but react to all the places Rui is touching...
